attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Soldiers' are being Murdered by the very people they are training and teaching to protect and rebuild Afghanistan. Bring our Soldiers' and Family back home. Rebuild Britain. Rebuild the Soldiers' Mourning Families that are left behind, Honour our Dead Soldiers' by doing so. I ask you Mr Prime Minister, to just see, see how many people want our Soldiers home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
